summary: This is an email from a Supervisory Correctional Systems Specialist at MCC New York, dated August 6, 2021, sending paperwork including a marshal's receipt and a court list example, and mentioning the search for an R&D assignment roster. It appears to be internal administrative communication regarding prison documentation.

persons.name: Supervisory Correctional Systems Specialist
persons.role: Supervisory Correctional Systems Specialist at MCC New York
persons.context: The sender of the email, working at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, who is providing paperwork and looking for an R&D assignment roster.

events.title: Email regarding prison paperwork
events.description: An email is sent by a Supervisory Correctional Systems Specialist at MCC New York, transmitting a marshal's receipt and a court list example, and noting a search for an R&D assignment roster.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 6, 2021, from a Supervisory Correctional Systems Specialist at MCC New York.
The email transmits a marshal's receipt and an example of a court list as requested paperwork.
The sender mentions they are still looking for an R&D assignment roster and plan to ask another R&D supervisor.
The communication is internal administrative, related to prison documentation and procedures.
The email includes a standard disclaimer about containing potentially sensitive information.
